QuestData.Title: The Scamps
QuestData.Description: You there! You have legs and a need for money? I wish to hire you.$b$bConfounded, despicable, parentless children have been stealing my scrolls again. Those scrolls are dangerous in the wrong hands.$b$bWhat is worse, I believe these junior vagabonds to be organized.$b$bFind these street scamps and relieve them of their bounty, and I shall pay you for it.
